name: RoboFootBag
description:
A retro pixel Art game  based on a distant future where robots play ball for fun.

This game was completed  in a very short time  and regardless of the frustration  fake enthusiasm, blood and acid tears something was delivered. 

On personal note for the music i borrowed the musical notes from a good old Star Wars theme ? can you guess which one it is?.

Game Play :    
Controls are  : moving  a-w-s-d  or arrows  and space to hit the ball, try to make a high score.  

If you are feeling lazy to down load any binaries feel free to try the HTML5 version here  https://a1i33n.herokuapp.com/robobag/index.html
